name: The Eat Repeat
description:
It’s food-collecting time and there are so many tasty dishes you can collect!

Upgrade your skills so you can go further and collect more food dishes as you explore the depths of this world.

Are you ready to be the next King of Eat Repeat?

More than a hundred unique delicious dishes for you to catch.
Try to catch them all!

Eat Repeat Features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay: Just Hold and Drag to catch food dishes!
- Idle Gameplay: The housewife earns you money while you are away!
- Become the Eat Repeat catching Master: Over 100 beautiful, unique food dishes for you to discover!
- Food gallery: see if you can collect them all!
